faqs.question: What are the typical size configurations for 3BHK apartments in this sector
faqs.answer: Typical size configurations for 3BHK flats in Sector 84 generally range from approximately 1450 square feet built-up area up to 2200 square feet. This variance accounts for different layouts such as 3BHK plus Study units or those with large utility balconies. Always check the RERA carpet area which provides the precise habitable space measurements before finalising your purchase decision.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of Sector 84 to Cyber City and other business centers
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major highlight. Sector 84 is located near the intersection of Dwarka Expressway and NH-48. faqs.question: Do I need to worry about RERA compliance when buying a 3BHK flat here
faqs.answer: When purchasing any property especially an apartment in Gurugram RERA Real Estate Regulatory Authority compliance is crucial. All reputable projects offering 3BHK flats in Sector 84 are RERA registered. We exclusively deal in verified properties and ensure that all necessary approvals permits and documentation are in place providing you with a secure and legally sound transaction process.

faqs.question: What are the maintenance charges generally levied for apartments in Sector 84 projects
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary by society and the level of amenities offered but typically fall within the range of INR 35 to INR 55 per square foot per month. These charges cover common area electricity water treatment security housekeeping and upkeep of club facilities. It is important to confirm the current maintenance rate and frequency of payment with the respective Resident Welfare Association RWA or builder management.

faqs.question: Are property taxes applicable on 3BHK flats in Sector 84 and how are they calculated
faqs.answer: Yes property taxes are applicable on all residential properties in Gurugram falling under the Municipal Corporation of Gurugram MCG jurisdiction. The tax amount is calculated based on factors like the covered area the age of the construction and the usage type residential or commercial. Tax rates are periodically updated by the MCG and payment is usually due annually or semi-annually.

faqs.question: What documents are essential before finalising the purchase of a resale 3BHK flat
faqs.answer: For a resale 3BHK transaction key documents include the Occupancy Certificate OC Completion Certificate CC the original Allotment Letter Sale Agreement previous chain of title documents No-Objection Certificate from the RWA and verified property tax receipts ensuring all previous dues have been cleared by the current owner. Our legal team assists in thorough verification of all these critical documents.
